name: Meal Master - Meal Planning App
desc: A full-stack application designed to help users plan, track, and analyze meals. Features include user authentication, recipe planner, nutrition insights, and meal tracking.

name: Destination Recommendation Platform
desc: A personalized travel platform recommending destinations based on interests, budget, and travel style, integrated with Firebase Auth and interactive maps.

name: Payout Automation System
desc: Built a full-stack payout automation system, featuring secure role-based dashboards for EdTech mentors and admins. Enabled seamless session assignment, automated payout calculations, and monthly receipt generation to simplify and optimize mentor compensation.

name: Priscription and Medication Management Tool
desc: Web-based full-stack application that enables users to efficiently manage their daily medications. From adding prescriptions to tracking history and personal health details â€” everything is streamlined in one place.

name: FinTrack - Personal Finance Tracker
desc: A responsive web application built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Firebase Firestore that helps users manage their income and expenses. Includes real-time transaction syncing, filtering, sorting, editing, and balance visualization, secured with Firebase Authentication.
